data.prayer: Spirit, how will they hear without a preacher? How will they preach unless they have a Bible? Please give the people in the state of Ehime access to a Bible in their own language.
data.verse: How, then, can they call on the one they have not believed in? And how can they believe in the one of whom they have not heard? And how can they hear without someone preaching to them? And how can anyone preach unless they are sent? As it is written: “How beautiful are the feet of those who bring good news!”

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Ehime, Japan
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Good Shepherd, thank you that you know the name of each of the 8,361 believers in Ehime.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd; I know my sheep and my sheep know me

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 176 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, reveal best practices for sharing the gospel in the state of Ehime.
Lord, raise up apostolic workers to plant churches in every town in the state of Ehime.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Eurasian people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Eurasian people.
Spirit, give the disciples of the the state of Ehime words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

data.prayer: Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the state of Ehime, Japan.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Lord, let it be said of the 1,468,438 lost in Ehime that you have called them out of darkness into your glorious light.
data.verse: But you are a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for God’s own possession, that you may proclaim the excellence of him who called you out of darkness into his marvelous light

location.name: Ehime
location.people_groups_list: Deaf, Mongol, Khalka, Turk, Amami-Oshima, Southern, Kikai
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Deaf (253,000), Mongol, Khalka (4,500), Turk (4,900), Amami-Oshima, Southern (1,800), Kikai (13,000)
